strapiPost.title: Arkansas Airports Get Funding
strapiPost.content:
As a result of the Airport Infrastructure Grant program, Arkansas airports will receive $23m in the first round of funding. Around $6m will go toward Northwest Arkansas airports.

  • Local aviation: The Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA), Bentonville Municipal, Springdale Municipal, Drake Field, and Rogers Executive will all receive funds, which can be invested in practically any project.
  • Include: The Federal Aviation Administration encourages airports to use the funds for projects that increase airport safety, equity and sustainability, and plans to reach out to minority businesses for these opportunities.
